items.title: Initial Documentation App Framework
items.description: Set up the base framework for a new documentation application to allow creation, editing, and viewing of documents.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a new document
User can edit an existing document
non_functional: Support for at least 100 concurrent users

notes: The requirement is vague; assumptions made about core features (create, edit, view). Further clarification needed on target audience, platform (web, mobile, desktop), and integration needs.
